General.name: join
General.desc: Joins a clan if it's public

General.name: invite
General.desc: Invites a user to a clan

General.name: get
General.desc: Sends a page with details about a clan

General.name: list
General.desc: A list of all clans in a server

Management.name: set
Management.desc: Sets an attribute in a clan

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.desc: Bans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: unban
Moderation.desc: Unbans a user from a clan

Moderation.name: kick
Moderation.desc: Kicks a user from a clan

Economy.name: withdraw
Economy.desc: Removes pearls from a clan YOU OWN

Economy.name: slots
Economy.desc: A slot machine that can multiply your bet by up to 10x

Admin.name: export
Admin.desc: Sends a JSON file with all clans in a server

Admin.name: import
Admin.desc: Replaces all clans in a server with those from a JSON file

Admin.name: forceset
Admin.desc: Sets a thing in a clan by force

Admin.name: forceshout
Admin.desc: Sets a clan shout by force

Admin.name: forcejoin
Admin.desc: Joins a clan even if it's private

Secret oOoOOoO.name: getglobal
Secret oOoOOoO.desc: Gets a clan no matter what server it's in

Secret oOoOOoO: `!getglobal <id>  •  Same as !get but clans from other servers
!forcedelete <id>  •  Lets you delete a clan by force
!forceset <id> <atr> <inp>  •  Lets you edit a clan by force
!forceshout <id> <message>  •  Changes a clan's shout by force
!forcejoin <id>  •  Lets you join a clan by force
!dump  •  Dumps the infostuffs table in a .JSON file in your DMs
!export  •  Lets you export all clans in a server into a .JSON file

!import <file>  •  Lets you import a .JSON file of clans into a server
`
